backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user ID generation, role registration (client, partner, internal), superadmin claiming, and access-control-gated user role storage.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated report listing feature requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs for the InternalLogin flow and related UI behaviors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human-written oneâ€‘sentence summaries for each frontend and backend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML host page loading the React app entrypoint into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manual router using the browser history API to switch between landing, auth, internal, and dashboard pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity session and refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login flow using Dfinity's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that checks via an actor whether the user can create a task.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled login options and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form collecting basic user information.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing a static welcome message and disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Asistenmu dashboard displaying a thank-you message with a disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard that conditionally enables task creation based on a query result.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard showing a static appreciation message and disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard displaying a static message about maintaining financial health.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Renders a simple partner dashboard layout with disabled logout and a welcome message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Displays the superadmin dashboard layout with disabled logout and a control-focused message.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Landing page for internal users with links to login and registration plus footer attribution.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Handles internal login flow, role selection, identity checks, and navigation based on backend user roles.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form with fields for basic user info and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with login and registration links for client and partner users.
Partner login screen with disabled authentication buttons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Partner registration form collecting personal info, WhatsApp, skills, and domicile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme options, animations, and three plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, frontend restrictions, backend scope notes, and known issues for planning.
